document.masterDocTitle: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes mlokossewiczi Radoszkowski 1891 : 254
, ♀, ♂ ( type locality: “Orenburg, Caucasus, Persia ”).
Colletes brevicornis Pérez 1903
(nom. praeocc., nec Robertson 1897 ): 226–227 ( type locality: Italy ).
Colletes brachycerus Swenk 1906 : 44
(replacement name for
Colletes brevicornis Pérez 1903
).

Portugal , Spain , France , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Italy , Serbia , Croatia , Macedonia , Romania , Bulgaria , Greece , Turkey , Ukraine , Russia , Georgia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan .
